subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin and Jarko Ruutu scored second-period goals, leading the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 3-1 victory against the host Ottawa Senators on Wednesday night to complete a four-game sweep of their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin and Jarko Ruutu scored second-period goals, leading the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 3-1 victory against the host Ottawa Senators on Wednesday night to complete a four-game sweep of their first-round playoff series.
